title: Meta Box
description: WordPress Custom Fields and Custom Meta Boxes Framework

id.description: ID, must be unique. Optional. If it's absent, it will be generated from the title.

option_name.description: Option name where settings data is saved to. Optional. Takes id if missed. If you want to use theme mods, then set this to theme_mods_$themeslug.

class.description: Custom CSS for the wrapper div.

menu_title.description: Menu title. Optional. Takes page_title if missed.

page_title.description: Page title. Optional. Takes menu_title if missed. Note: either menu_title or page_title (or both) must have value.

capability.description: Required capability to access the settings page. Optional. Default edit_theme_options.

icon_url.description: The icon for the menu. Supports Dashicons (dashicons-icon-name), FontAwesome free (fa fa-home), SVG (data:image/svg+xml;base64...) and custom URL.

position.description: Menu position (number). See below for the list of default WordPress menu positions.

parent.description: The ID of the parent page, if you want the settings page to be a submenu. Optional. Can be a WordPress menu or custom settings page menu. See below for the list of WordPress page IDs.

submenu_title.description: Set this to the default submenu title (first submenu) if the settings page is a top-level menu. Optional.

help_tabs.description: Array of help tabs. Each tab is an array with title and content.

callback.description: Callback function to display the tab content. The function must be in the global scope.

style.description: How do you want to style the settings page? Supports boxes which has same the style as normal WordPress meta boxes (like in the edit post screen) and no-boxes which has the same style as WordPress settings pages. In no-boxes style, each meta box is a section of the settings page.

columns.description: The number of columns in the meta boxes. Can be 1 (the same as WordPress settings pages) or 2 (the same as the edit post screen).

tabs.description: Array of tabs for the settings page.

icon.description: Tab icon. Supports Dashicons (dashicons-icon-name), FontAwesome free (fa fa-home), SVG (data:image/svg+xml;base64...) and custom URL.

tab_style.description: Tab style. Default is default. Left is the style that the tabs are on the left side of the settings page.

submit_button.description: Submit button text. Optional. Default Save Changes.

message.description: Message to show after saving settings. Optional.

customizer.description: Whether to add the settings page to the customizer. Optional. Default false.

customizer_only.description: Whether to show the settings page only in the customizer. Optional. Default false.

network.description: Whether to show the settings page in the network admin. Optional. Default false.
